description: A collection of circles in a triangular formation with a rounded top; there is also a cross-shaped formation of circles overlapping the top of the triangular formation and a thick rectangular formation of circles extending from the bottom of the triangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is an orange triangle at the top of the triangular formation and a dark reddish-brown triangle at the top of the rectangular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
